title: BRIEF-Dirtt Says Shares To Commence Trading On Nasdaq Global Select Market
text:
BRIEF-Dirtt Says Shares To Commence Trading On Nasdaq Global Select Market

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 08, 2019 17:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dirtt Says Shares To Commence Trading On Nasdaq Global Select Market Oct 8 (Reuters) - DIRTT Environmental Solutions Ltd : * DIRTT COMMENCES TRADING ON NASDAQ GLOBAL SELECT MARKET UNDER THE SYMBOL "DRTT" * DIRTT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS - COMMON SHARES WILL COMMENCE TRADING ON NASDAQ GLOBAL SELECT MARKET ON OCT. 9 UNDER TICKER SYMBOL "DRTT"

BRIEF-Dirtt Says Shares To Commence Trading On Nasdaq Global Select Market
